name: Pull-up
tips: If you can't do a pull-up, try a chin-up, which is easier.
If you can't do a chin-up, try a negative pull-up, which is easier still.
steps: Hang from a pull-up bar with your hands shoulder-width apart.
Pull your chest up to the bar, then lower yourself back to the starting position.
description: The pull-up is a bodyweight exercise that targets the muscles of the back and biceps. It is a challenging exercise that requires upper body strength and core stability.
